verses.verse: מִקֵּ֥ץ <S%H7093><s%> At the end שֶֽׁבַע־ <S%H7651><s%> of [every] seven שָׁנִ֖ים <S%H8141><s%> years תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> thou shalt make שְׁמִטָּֽה׃ <S%H8059><s%> a release

וְזֶה֮ <S%H2088><s%> This דְּבַ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> And this [is] the manner הַשְּׁמִטָּה֒ <S%H8059><s%> of the release שָׁמ֗וֹט <S%H8058><s%> shall release כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every בַּ֙עַל֙ <S%H1167><s%> archer מַשֵּׁ֣ה <S%H4874><s%> creditor יָד֔וֹ <S%H3027><s%> able אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> what יַשֶּׁ֖ה <S%H5383><s%> that lendeth בְּרֵעֵ֑הוּ <S%H7453><s%> [ought] unto his neighbour לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not יִגֹּ֤שׂ <S%H5065><s%> [it] he shall not exact אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֵעֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H7453><s%> [it] of his neighbour וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָחִ֔יו <S%H251><s%> or of his brother כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because קָרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> because it is called שְׁמִטָּ֖ה <S%H8059><s%> release לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD'S

אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנָּכְרִ֖י <S%H5237><s%> Of a foreigner תִּגֹּ֑שׂ <S%H5065><s%> thou mayest exact וַאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> whatever יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become לְךָ֛ אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> is with אָחִ֖יךָ <S%H251><s%> [it again] but [that] which is thine with thy brother תַּשְׁמֵ֥ט <S%H8058><s%> shall release יָדֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3027><s%> thine hand

אֶ֕פֶס <S%H657><s%> Save כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> since לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> will be no יִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> become בְּךָ֖ אֶבְי֑וֹן <S%H34><s%> when there shall be no poor כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> since בָרֵ֤ךְ <S%H1288><s%> shall greatly יְבָֽרֶכְךָ֙ <S%H1288><s%> bless יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> among you for the LORD בָּאָ֕רֶץ <S%H776><s%> thee in the land אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> which יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God נֹֽתֵן־ <S%H5414><s%> giveth לְךָ֥ נַחֲלָ֖ה <S%H5159><s%> thee [for] an inheritance לְרִשְׁתָּֽהּ׃ <S%H3423><s%> to possess

רַ֚ק <S%H7535><s%> but אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if שָׁמ֣וֹעַ <S%H8085><s%> Only if thou carefully תִּשְׁמַ֔ע <S%H8085><s%> hearken בְּק֖וֹל <S%H6963><s%> unto the voice יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God לִשְׁמֹ֤ר <S%H8104><s%> to observe לַעֲשׂוֹת֙ <S%H6213><s%> to do אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַמִּצְוָ֣ה <S%H4687><s%> all these commandments הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> likewise אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> which אָנֹכִ֥י <S%H595><s%> I מְצַוְּךָ֖ <S%H6680><s%> which I command הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> thee this day

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> For the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> thy God בֵּֽרַכְךָ֔ <S%H1288><s%> blesseth כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> you דִּבֶּר־ <S%H1696><s%> thee as he promised לָ֑ךְ וְהַֽעֲבַטְתָּ֞ <S%H5670><s%> thee and thou shalt lend גּוֹיִ֣ם <S%H1471><s%> nations רַבִּ֗ים <S%H7227><s%> unto many וְאַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> you לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> you will not תַעֲבֹ֔ט <S%H5670><s%> but thou shalt not borrow וּמָֽשַׁלְתָּ֙ <S%H4910><s%> and thou shalt reign בְּגוֹיִ֣ם <S%H1471><s%> nations רַבִּ֔ים <S%H7227><s%> over many וּבְךָ֖ לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> they will not יִמְשֹֽׁלוּ׃ <S%H4910><s%> but they shall not reign ס

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> If יִהְיֶה֩ <S%H1961><s%> become בְךָ֨ אֶבְי֜וֹן <S%H34><s%> If there be among you a poor man מֵאַחַ֤ד <S%H259><s%> of one אַחֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H251><s%> of thy brethren בְּאַחַ֣ד <S%H259><s%> within any שְׁעָרֶ֔יךָ <S%H8179><s%> of thy gates בְּאַ֨רְצְךָ֔ <S%H776><s%> in thy land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God נֹתֵ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> giveth לָ֑ךְ לֹ֧א <S%H3808><s%> nor תְאַמֵּ֣ץ <S%H553><s%> thee thou shalt not harden אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לְבָבְךָ֗ <S%H3824><s%> thine heart וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> nor תִקְפֹּץ֙ <S%H7092><s%> nor shut אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָ֣דְךָ֔ <S%H3027><s%> thine hand מֵאָחִ֖יךָ <S%H251><s%> brother הָאֶבְיֽוֹן׃ <S%H34><s%> from thy poor

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for פָתֹ֧חַ <S%H6605><s%> But thou shalt open תִּפְתַּ֛ח <S%H6605><s%> wide אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָדְךָ֖ <S%H3027><s%> thine hand ל֑וֹ וְהַעֲבֵט֙ <S%H5670><s%> unto him and shalt surely תַּעֲבִיטֶ֔נּוּ <S%H5670><s%> lend דֵּ֚י <S%H1767><s%> him sufficient מַחְסֹר֔וֹ <S%H4270><s%> for his need אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whatever יֶחְסַ֖ר <S%H2637><s%> [in that] which he wanteth לֽוֹ׃

הִשָּׁ֣מֶר <S%H8104><s%> Beware לְךָ֡ פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> is no יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become דָבָר֩ <S%H1697><s%> that there be not a thought עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> in לְבָבְךָ֨ <S%H3824><s%> heart בְלִיַּ֜עַל <S%H1100><s%> in thy wicked לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> saying קָֽרְבָ֣ה <S%H7126><s%> is at hand שְׁנַֽת־ <S%H8141><s%> year הַשֶּׁבַע֮ <S%H7651><s%> The seventh שְׁנַ֣ת <S%H8141><s%> the year הַשְּׁמִטָּה֒ <S%H8059><s%> of release וְרָעָ֣ה <S%H7489><s%> be evil עֵֽינְךָ֗ <S%H5869><s%> and thine eye בְּאָחִ֙יךָ֙ <S%H251><s%> brother הָֽאֶבְי֔וֹן <S%H34><s%> against thy poor וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nothing תִתֵּ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> and thou givest ל֑וֹ וְקָרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> him nought and he cry עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5921><s%> against אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become בְךָ֖ חֵֽטְא׃ <S%H2399><s%> against thee and it be sin

נָת֤וֹן <S%H5414><s%> Thou shalt surely תִּתֵּן֙ <S%H5414><s%> give ל֔וֹ וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יֵרַ֥ע <S%H7489><s%> shall not be grieved לְבָבְךָ֖ <S%H3824><s%> him and thine heart בְּתִתְּךָ֣ <S%H5414><s%> when thou givest ל֑וֹ כִּ֞י <S%H3588><s%> for בִּגְלַ֣ל ׀ <S%H1558><s%> unto him because הַדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> that for this thing הַזֶּ֗ה <S%H2088><s%> this יְבָרֶכְךָ֙ <S%H1288><s%> shall bless יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God בְּכָֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מַעֲשֶׂ֔ךָ <S%H4639><s%> thee in all thy works וּבְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all מִשְׁלַ֥ח <S%H4916><s%> and in all that thou puttest יָדֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3027><s%> thine hand

כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> will never יֶחְדַּ֥ל <S%H2308><s%> shall never cease אֶבְי֖וֹן <S%H34><s%> For the poor מִקֶּ֣רֶב <S%H7130><s%> out of הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֞ן <S%H3651><s%> after that אָנֹכִ֤י <S%H595><s%> I מְצַוְּךָ֙ <S%H6680><s%> therefore I command לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> thee saying פָּ֠תֹחַ <S%H6605><s%> Thou shalt open תִּפְתַּ֨ח <S%H6605><s%> wide אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָדְךָ֜ <S%H3027><s%> thine hand לְאָחִ֧יךָ <S%H251><s%> unto thy brother לַעֲנִיֶּ֛ךָ <S%H6041><s%> to thy poor וּלְאֶבְיֹנְךָ֖ <S%H34><s%> and to thy needy בְּאַרְצֶֽךָ׃ <S%H776><s%> in thy land ס

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> If יִמָּכֵ֨ר <S%H4376><s%> be sold לְךָ֜ אָחִ֣יךָ <S%H251><s%> [And] if thy brother הָֽעִבְרִ֗י <S%H5680><s%> an Hebrew man א֚וֹ <S%H176><s%> or הָֽעִבְרִיָּ֔ה <S%H5680><s%> or an Hebrew woman וַעֲבָֽדְךָ֖ <S%H5647><s%> unto thee and serve שֵׁ֣שׁ <S%H8337><s%> thee six שָׁנִ֑ים <S%H8141><s%> years וּבַשָּׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> year הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔ת <S%H7637><s%> then in the seventh תְּשַׁלְּחֶ֥נּוּ <S%H7971><s%> thou shalt let him go חָפְשִׁ֖י <S%H2670><s%> free מֵעִמָּֽךְ׃ <S%H5973><s%> with

וְכִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When תְשַׁלְּחֶ֥נּוּ <S%H7971><s%> And when thou sendest חָפְשִׁ֖י <S%H2670><s%> him out free מֵֽעִמָּ֑ךְ <S%H5973><s%> with לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תְשַׁלְּחֶ֖נּוּ <S%H7971><s%> from thee thou shalt not let him go away רֵיקָֽם׃ <S%H7387><s%> empty

הַעֲנֵ֤יק <S%H6059><s%> Thou shalt furnish תַּעֲנִיק֙ <S%H6059><s%> him liberally ל֔וֹ מִצֹּ֣אנְךָ֔ <S%H6629><s%> out of thy flock וּמִֽגָּרְנְךָ֖ <S%H1637><s%> and out of thy floor וּמִיִּקְבֶ֑ךָ <S%H3342><s%> and out of thy winepress אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> after בֵּרַכְךָ֛ <S%H1288><s%> hath blessed יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> [of that] wherewith the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God תִּתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> thee thou shalt give לֽוֹ׃

וְזָכַרְתָּ֗ <S%H2142><s%> And thou shalt remember כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for עֶ֤בֶד <S%H5650><s%> that thou wast a bondman הָיִ֙יתָ֙ <S%H1961><s%> become בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וַֽיִּפְדְּךָ֖ <S%H6299><s%> redeemed יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֞ן <S%H3651><s%> after that אָנֹכִ֧י <S%H595><s%> I מְצַוְּךָ֛ <S%H6680><s%> thee therefore I command אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> thee this thing הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> to day

וְהָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> shall come כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> if יֹאמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> And it shall be if he say אֵלֶ֔יךָ <S%H413><s%> about לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> I will not אֵצֵ֖א <S%H3318><s%> unto thee I will not go away מֵעִמָּ֑ךְ <S%H5973><s%> with כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> because אֲהֵֽבְךָ֙ <S%H157><s%> from thee because he loveth וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּיתֶ֔ךָ <S%H1004><s%> thee and thine house כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> since ט֥וֹב <S%H2895><s%> because he is well ל֖וֹ עִמָּֽךְ׃ <S%H5973><s%> you

וְלָקַחְתָּ֣ <S%H3947><s%> Then thou shalt take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּרְצֵ֗עַ <S%H4836><s%> an aul וְנָתַתָּ֤ה <S%H5414><s%> and thrust בְאָזְנוֹ֙ <S%H241><s%> [it] through his ear וּבַדֶּ֔לֶת <S%H1817><s%> unto the door וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become לְךָ֖ עֶ֣בֶד <S%H5650><s%> and he shall be thy servant עוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever וְאַ֥ף <S%H637><s%> Also לַאֲמָתְךָ֖ <S%H519><s%> And also unto thy maidservant תַּעֲשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> thou shalt do כֵּֽן׃ <S%H3651><s%> likewise

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not יִקְשֶׁ֣ה <S%H7185><s%> It shall not seem hard בְעֵינֶ֗ךָ <S%H5869><s%> unto thee בְּשַׁלֵּֽחֲךָ֙ <S%H7971><s%> when thou sendest him away אֹת֤וֹ <S%H853><s%> חָפְשִׁי֙ <S%H2670><s%> free מֵֽעִמָּ֔ךְ <S%H5973><s%> with כִּ֗י <S%H3588><s%> for מִשְׁנֶה֙ <S%H4932><s%> a double שְׂכַ֣ר <S%H7939><s%> from thee for he hath been worth שָׂכִ֔יר <S%H7916><s%> hired servant עֲבָֽדְךָ֖ <S%H5647><s%> [to thee] in serving שֵׁ֣שׁ <S%H8337><s%> thee six שָׁנִ֑ים <S%H8141><s%> years וּבֵֽרַכְךָ֙ <S%H1288><s%> shall bless יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God בְּכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all manner אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> you תַּעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> thee in all that thou doest פ
